Introduction: The adventurers are summoned by the Olma, a powerful sorceress, to investigate the disappearance of the ancient city of Eldorado, rumored to be the home of valuable treasures and artifacts. Olma explains that the last known location of Eldorado was within a dense forest that lies between two mighty rivers. She tasks the adventurers with finding the city and discovering what happened to it.

The Dense Forest.Description: The adventurers must navigate through the dense forest hazard linking the two rivers. There are rumors surrounding this forest, and stories suggest that there may be clues within the trees to unlock the path to Eldorado.

1.1 - The Crossing.Description: The adventurers must navigate the crocodile-infested waters of the first river, which lies at the forest's entrance.
1.1 - The Crossing.Setting: The dense forest that lies between two mighty rivers.
1.1 - The Crossing.Objective: Navigate through the dense forest and cross the first river to continue the search for Eldorado.

Favors: A favor from Olma to be redeemed at a later time.
Information: Information about the location of a hidden cave that may contain valuable artifacts.

NPCs.Name: Captain Rorik
NPCs.Backstory: Captain Rorik is a seasoned fighter who has spent his life protecting the people of the nearby town. He has agreed to help the party cross the river in exchange for their assistance in dealing with a group of bandits that have been causing trouble in his town.
NPCs.Quest Related Information: Captain Rorik knows of a hidden cave that may contain valuable artifacts. He has agreed to share this information with the party if they help him deal with the bandits.

NPCs.Name: Evelyn
NPCs.Backstory: Evelyn is a skilled ranger who has spent her life exploring the dense forest. She has agreed to help the party navigate through the forest in exchange for their assistance in dealing with a group of poachers who have been hunting in the forest.
NPCs.Quest Related Information: Evelyn knows of a hidden cave that may contain valuable artifacts. She has agreed to share this information with the party if they help her deal with the poachers.

1.2 - The Hidden Clues.Description: The adventurers discover hidden clues within the trees which point them towards Eldorado.
1.2 - The Hidden Clues.Setting: The dense forest between two mighty rivers, filled with dangerous creatures and hidden secrets.
1.2 - The Hidden Clues.Objective: Find the lost city of Eldorado and discover what happened to it.

Favors: Olma owes the party a favor for their successful completion of the quest.
Information: Information about the location of Eldorado.
Information about the sorcerer who destroyed Eldorado.

NPCs.Name: Olma
NPCs.Backstory: Olma is a powerful sorceress who has spent her life studying the arcane arts. She has a reputation for being reclusive and mysterious, but her knowledge and power are unmatched.
NPCs.Quest Related Information: Olma provides the party with a map of the forest and information about the location of Eldorado.

NPCs.Name: Sariel
NPCs.Backstory: Sariel is a skilled ranger who has spent her life tracking down dangerous creatures in the wild. She is a loner by nature, but has agreed to help the party in their quest.
NPCs.Quest Related Information: Sariel has heard rumors of a hidden cave in the forest that may contain clues about the location of Eldorado.

NPCs.Name: Thorn
NPCs.Backstory: Thorn is a fierce warrior who has spent his life battling monsters and raiders. He is fiercely loyal to his friends and will stop at nothing to protect them.
NPCs.Quest Related Information: Thorn has heard rumors of a group of territorial dryads who guard a tree that may hold the key to finding Eldorado.

1.3 - The Ancient Tree.Description: The adventurers stumble upon an ancient tree that seems to match the clues they've discovered, but it is guarded by a group of territorial dryads.
1.3 - The Ancient Tree.Setting: The dense forest that lies between two mighty rivers.
1.3 - The Ancient Tree.Objective: Find the ancient city of Eldorado and discover what happened to it.

Items: A map of the forest with all the clues marked
Favors: Olma owes the adventurers a favor
Information: Information about the history of Eldorado and the artifact that destroyed it.
Information about the dryads and their weaknesses.

NPCs.Name: Olma
NPCs.Backstory: Olma is a powerful sorceress who has spent her life studying ancient magic. She is known for her expertise in unlocking the secrets of lost civilizations.
NPCs.Quest Related Information: Olma has provided the adventurers with a map of the forest and information about the history of Eldorado.

NPCs.Name: Dryad Queen
Items: A magical acorn that can summon a group of treants
NPCs.Backstory: The Dryad Queen is the leader of the group of dryads that guard the ancient tree. She is fiercely protective of her territory and will do whatever it takes to keep intruders out.
NPCs.Quest Related Information: The Dryad Queen possesses information about the artifact that destroyed Eldorado and may be willing to share it in exchange for a favor.

NPCs.Name: Eldorado Historian
NPCs.Backstory: The Eldorado Historian is a bard who has spent his life studying the history of the lost city. He possesses a wealth of knowledge about the city's culture, customs, and artifacts.
NPCs.Quest Related Information: The Eldorado Historian possesses information about the artifact that destroyed Eldorado and may be willing to share it in exchange for a favor.

The City's History.Description: Once the adventurers arrive in Eldorado, they must discover the city's history and try to find any clues about its disappearance. Eldorado was said to be a thriving and prosperous city, with vast libraries and archives packed full of knowledge and artifacts.

2.1 - The Royal Hall.Description: The adventurers find the royal hall, which houses archives and ancient documents.
2.1 - The Royal Hall.Setting: The ancient city of Eldorado, located in a dense forest between two mighty rivers.
2.1 - The Royal Hall.Objective: Discover the city's history and find any clues about its disappearance.

Favors: Olma owes the party a favor for their bravery and service.
Information: Information about the city's history and disappearance.
Information about the magical artifact used to destroy the city.

NPCs.Name: Olma
NPCs.Backstory: Olma is a powerful sorceress who has spent her life studying magic and the arcane. She is known for her ability to see into the future and predict events before they happen.
NPCs.Quest Related Information: Olma has provided the adventurers with a map of the forest and some basic information about the city's history.

NPCs.Name: Archivist Tarek
NPCs.Backstory: Tarek is the head archivist of Eldorado's royal hall. He has spent his life studying the city's history and collecting ancient artifacts.
NPCs.Quest Related Information: Tarek has information about the city's history and the location of the royal hall.

NPCs.Name: Grave Robber Leader
NPCs.Backstory: The grave robber leader is a ruthless criminal who has been raiding Eldorado's tombs and crypts for valuable treasures.
NPCs.Quest Related Information: The grave robber leader has information about the magical artifact used to destroy the city and may be willing to trade it for a valuable item or favor.

2.2 - The City's Tour.Description: The adventurers take a tour to explore the city and find clues about its disappearance.
2.2 - The City's Tour.Setting: The ancient city of Eldorado, a once-thriving metropolis filled with knowledge and artifacts.
2.2 - The City's Tour.Objective: Discover the city's history and find clues about its disappearance.

Favors: Olma owes the party a favor for their successful completion of the quest.
Information: Information about the city's history and disappearance.

NPCs.Name: Professor Thaddeus
NPCs.Backstory: Professor Thaddeus is a renowned wizard and scholar who has spent his life studying ancient civilizations. He has been hired by Olma to assist the party in their quest.
NPCs.Quest Related Information: Professor Thaddeus has heard rumors of a hidden library within the city that may contain valuable information about Eldorado's history.

NPCs.Name: Samantha the Explorer
NPCs.Backstory: Samantha is a skilled explorer who has spent her life traveling to remote locations in search of treasure and adventure. She has joined the party in hopes of finding valuable artifacts in Eldorado.
NPCs.Quest Related Information: Samantha has heard rumors of a hidden treasure room within the city that may contain valuable artifacts.

2.3 - The Tomb Raider.Description: The adventurers must defeat a group of grave robbers who seem to be searching for something specific within the city.
2.3 - The Tomb Raider.Setting: The ancient city of Eldorado, a once-thriving metropolis filled with knowledge and artifacts.
2.3 - The Tomb Raider.Objective: Discover the city's history and find any clues about its disappearance. Defeat the grave robbers who are searching for something specific within the city.

Items: Golden Chalice of the Sun God
Jeweled Dagger of the High Priestess
Favors: A favor from Olma, the powerful sorceress who summoned the adventurers.
Information: Information about the grave robbers' motives and the location of their hideout.

NPCs.Name: Kethril Shadowblade
NPCs.Backstory: Kethril is a skilled ranger who has spent his life tracking down dangerous creatures in the wild. He is a loner by nature, but has agreed to help the party in their quest.
NPCs.Quest Related Information: Kethril has heard rumors of a hidden entrance to the grave robbers' hideout located in the city's catacombs.

NPCs.Name: Sariel Nightshade
NPCs.Backstory: Sariel is a cunning rogue who has made a name for herself as a master thief. She has been hired by the grave robbers to help them find a specific artifact within the city.
NPCs.Quest Related Information: Sariel has information about the grave robbers' motives and the location of their hideout within the city.

NPCs.Name: Gorin Stonefist
NPCs.Backstory: Gorin is a gruff and stoic dwarf who has spent his life honing his skills as a fighter and blacksmith. He has been hired by the adventurers to help them defeat the grave robbers.
NPCs.Quest Related Information: Gorin has information about the layout of the city's catacombs and the best way to navigate them.

The Final Confrontation.Description: After the adventurers have gathered all necessary clues and items, they realize the city was destroyed by a powerful magical artifact. They must confront the sorcerer who unleashed this artifact and prevent him from using it again.

3.1 - The Sorcerer's Lair.Description: The adventurers sneak into the sorcerer's hidden lair to stop his evil plans.
3.1 - The Sorcerer's Lair.Setting: The sorcerer's hidden lair, a dark and foreboding place filled with traps and magical defenses.
3.1 - The Sorcerer's Lair.Objective: Confront the sorcerer and prevent him from using the powerful magical artifact again.

Favors: Olma owes the party a favor for their successful mission.
Information: Information about the sorcerer's plans and the location of other powerful magical artifacts.

NPCs.Name: Olma
NPCs.Backstory: Olma is a powerful sorceress who has spent her life studying the arcane arts. She is a member of the Council of Mages and is highly respected among her peers.
NPCs.Quest Related Information: Olma provides the adventurers with information about the location of Eldorado and the sorcerer's lair.

NPCs.Name: Sorcerer Xalvador
NPCs.Backstory: Xalvador was once a respected member of the Council of Mages, but his thirst for power led him down a dark path. He seeks to use the magical artifact to gain ultimate power and control over the land.
NPCs.Quest Related Information: Xalvador reveals his plans to the adventurers and provides information about the location of other powerful magical artifacts.

NPCs.Name: Thorn
NPCs.Backstory: Thorn is a skilled rogue who has spent his life as a thief and assassin. He has been hired by Olma to assist the adventurers in their mission.
NPCs.Quest Related Information: Thorn provides the adventurers with information about the sorcerer's lair and helps them navigate its traps and defenses.

3.2 - The Magical Artifact.Description: The adventurers face off with the sorcerer to stop him from unleashing the magical artifact again.
3.2 - The Magical Artifact.Setting: The ancient city of Eldorado, a once-great metropolis now in ruins.
3.2 - The Magical Artifact.Objective: Confront the sorcerer and prevent him from using the magical artifact again.

Favors: Olma owes the party a favor for stopping the sorcerer and preventing the artifact from being used again.
Information: Information about the sorcerer's plans and motivations.

NPCs.Name: Sorcerer Zoltar
Skills/Abilities: Expert in the use of magical artifacts
Skilled in the art of deception
NPCs.Backstory: Zoltar was once a respected member of the magical community, but his obsession with power and control led him down a dark path. He seeks to use the magical artifact to gain ultimate power and become the most powerful sorcerer in the world.
NPCs.Quest Related Information: Zoltar has set up a series of magical traps and wards to protect himself and the artifact. The party will need to use their wits and skills to bypass these defenses.

NPCs.Name: Olma
Skills/Abilities: Skilled in the art of negotiation
NPCs.Backstory: Olma is a powerful sorceress who has dedicated her life to protecting the world from magical threats. She has been tracking Zoltar's movements for some time and believes that he is responsible for the disappearance of Eldorado.
NPCs.Quest Related Information: Olma has provided the party with a map of the forest and some basic information about the traps and defenses that Zoltar has set up. She will also be available to provide magical support during the confrontation with Zoltar.

3.3 - The Escape.Description: Once the magical artifact is destroyed, the adventurers have to make a quick and daring escape as the lair crumbles down in response to the loss of its power.
3.3 - The Escape.Setting: The lair of the sorcerer, a dark and foreboding place filled with traps and magical defenses.
3.3 - The Escape.Objective: Escape the lair before it crumbles and traps the adventurers inside.

Favors: Olma owes the adventurers a favor for stopping the sorcerer and returning the magical artifact.
Information: The sorcerer's lair may contain other valuable artifacts and treasures.

NPCs.Name: Sorcerer Zoltar
NPCs.Backstory: Zoltar was once a respected member of the magical community, but his thirst for power led him down a dark path. He seeks to use the magical artifact to gain ultimate power and control over the land.
NPCs.Quest Related Information: Zoltar has set up numerous traps and magical defenses throughout his lair to prevent anyone from stopping him.

NPCs.Name: Thorn
NPCs.Backstory: Thorn is a skilled thief who was hired by Zoltar to guard his lair. He is fiercely loyal to Zoltar and will stop at nothing to protect him.
NPCs.Quest Related Information: Thorn is the first line of defense in Zoltar's lair and will try to stop the adventurers from reaching Zoltar.

NPCs.Name: Elena
NPCs.Backstory: Elena is a cleric who was captured by Zoltar and forced to work for him. She secretly wants to help the adventurers and will provide them with information and healing if they can free her.
NPCs.Quest Related Information: Elena knows the layout of Zoltar's lair and can provide the adventurers with valuable information on how to navigate it.

Conclusion: The adventurers return to Olma with the magical artifact and explain the quest's new discoveries. Olma rewards the party for their bravery and expertise, and the adventures depart with the satisfaction of knowing they have done the right thing. Eldorado is now a thing of the past, but the knowledge gathered during the journey will live on.
